title: huge stuttering and delay in game
body:
Randomly started getting insane stuttering and lag in game, my ping has only gone up by 20-30 recently (~60 -> 80-100, west coast). I can't see the fps tracker in game, it stopped appearing for me a while ago. I tried a custom game, same thing. My PC is fine and hasn't gone under virtually any changes, as I said this is completely random.

edit 1: I also tried switching to the old client which didn't fix anything

replies.body: Hello, last night I was running League on very high at 60Fps and 23 ping. Today I struggle to maintain 7 fps but my ping is fine. I don't know what happened today, but League is unplayable right now. also I Ran the log reader and it says I have no network issues and had a stable connection. I also ran a repair and reinstalled the game but issues still persist.

That sounds like a strange case, and we should determine if you're experiencing an fps or connection issue here.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of your network.  Let me know what you find, along with any other symptoms you're experiencing.
